Summary: pyrimid shape black .... HUGE ...... APPROX. 7 TO 10 FOOTBALL FIELDS IN DIAM.
divs: sighting detailsi am a witness reporting for the main witness which called me on the phone and made me aware of the ship in the air. we live near each other. there were several witnesses. everyone is terrified. please contact and allow me to get everyone together that saw it for you to speak with ,all at the same time.. guys .... were scared ... the vehicle was putting a dark black cloud out for miles behind it. we may have all been gassed by something. the really crazy thing was that last week 5 chinook helicopters flew into everett and parked over by my friends house, and when the vehicle was moving thru out the area ...... the five chinook choppers were escorting it... but they stayed about 1\4 mile away on the points and sides of the craft.... until at one point one of them did something i have never heard about ever before in my life.you won't believe it and i still don't know how the damn thing did it ! guys and gals ... we have so much to tell you .... you have got to believe us !!!! something terrible is about to happen. one witness saw a blue creature outside of his house after flashing his flash lite at the ship . . . _ _ _ . . . the universal sos in morse. another witness is this 90 year old lady who lives ...well never mind that.... but she was in her house as several of the smaller craft were seen all around. they were yellow blue and red lights flying everywhere so when one of the witnesses goes home his grandmother asked him if he had been out in the back yard watching all the pretty lights.he asked her what lights and she said the red, blue, and yellow ones that keep flying around in the back yard. so now he's afraid that maybe they know he saw them. unfortunately none of us had a camera. i could not believe it but my cell doesn't even have one but please say someone got a pic of it here. surely we cant be the only ones to have seen this ...it was waaaayyy to big !!! absolutely no press please. if you report this to the govt. or anyone that has anything to do with them please leave our names out. please ..... we trust very few people now ... we don't want any trouble from anyone. we just want to tell you what we saw and sort of just disappear ya know? [name removed\cms\tg]
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Everett
There were no other sightings in Everett on or around December 6th 2011
